property.name: Exemplar Type
property.desc: Used by property editors to group exemplars and filter properties

property.name: Exemplar Interface ID
property.desc: A GZGUID that identifies a class interface

property.name: Exemplar Class ID
property.desc: A GZCLSID that identifies a class implementation

property.name: Exemplar Name
property.desc: Identifies this exemplar in property editors

property.name: Exemplar ID
property.desc: Identifies this exemplar so that C++ code and other exemplars can refer to it

property.name: PluginPackID
property.desc: ID of the plugin pack to which the data belongs

property.name: User Visible Name Key
property.desc: Resource key of the name of what this exemplar represents

property.name: Hover Query Only
property.desc: If present, the occupant will respond to hover queries but not to click-queries

property.name: Exemplar Category
property.desc: Categorizes this exemplar; for debug and exemplar editors use only

property.name: Resource Key Type 0
property.desc: Specifies 1 model key for all Z/R

property.name: Resource Key Type 1
property.desc: Specifies 1 model key for each Z/R

property.name: Resource Key Type 2
property.desc: A unique instance ID for each zoom and rotation.

property.name: Resource Key Type 3
property.desc: A unique instance ID for each zoom

property.name: Resource Key Type 4
property.desc: Multi-model, multi state (see tuning docs)

property.name: Resource Key Type 5
property.desc: Specifies 1 model key for each Z/R/state

property.name: Resource Key Type 1xm
property.desc: Specifies 1 model key for each Z/R

property.name: Resource Key Type 2xm
property.desc: A unique instance ID for each zoom and rotation.

property.name: Resource Key Type 3xm
property.desc: A unique instance ID for each zoom

property.name: Resource Key Type 4xm
property.desc: Multi-model, multi state (see tuning docs)

property.name: Resource Key Type 5xm
property.desc: Specifies 1 model key for each Z/R/state

property.name: mfWindPerturbationRange
property.desc: Angular window for periodic variation of ambient wind direction (0-90 degrees)

property.name: mfMoistureHillFactor
property.desc: Wind effect on hill moisture (H20 fractional units per m/s of perpendicular wind penetration)

property.name: mfValleyMoistureBoost
property.desc: Moisture boost for areas detected as valleys (0-1)

property.name: mfMoistureValleySlopeThreshold
property.desc: Minimum concavity required to detect area as valley (linear height deviation in meters)

property.name: mMoistureVariationScale
property.desc: Amplitude of plasma-based noise in moisture map (map creation only)

property.name: mMoistureDitherScale
property.desc: Amplitude of high-freq. dithering noise in moisture map (map creation only)

property.name: Particle Life
property.desc: Total lifetime of fog particle (ms)

property.name: Wind Factor
property.desc: Wind power coefficient (v = wind * c)

property.name: Terrain Factor
property.desc: Terrain gradient coefficient (effect of hills)

property.name: Max Particle Rate
property.desc: Max fog creation rate (particles/sec)

property.name: Particle FOV
property.desc: Angular window centered around anti-wind direction in which fog appears (degrees)

property.name: Float Altitude
property.desc: Floating distance of fog above terrain

property.name: Max Opacity
property.desc: Maximum alpha value for particles (0-255)

property.name: Fade-in Time
property.desc: Initial portion of particle life for fade-in (ms)

property.name: Fade-out Time
property.desc: Terminal portion of particle life for fade-out (ms)

property.name: Particle Count
property.desc: Maximum number of fog particles

property.name: Fog Rate by Hour
property.desc: Fraction (0-1) of maximum particle rate by hour of the clock

property.name: MtnCloudsHeight
property.desc: Height that clouds float at

property.name: MtnCloudsFormHeight
property.desc: Lowest terrain height that clouds form over

property.name: MtnCloudsFadeInHeight
property.desc: Lowest terrain height that clouds have max opacity

property.name: MtnCloudsFadeOutHeight
property.desc: Terrain height above which clouds begin to fade

property.name: MtnCloudsDisperseHeight
property.desc: Terrain height above which clouds fade completely

property.name: MtnCloudsSlowDownHeight
property.desc: Terrain height above which clouds begin to slow

property.name: MtnCloudsStopHeight
property.desc: Terrain height above which clouds stop completely

property.name: MtnCloudsSizeRange
property.desc: Min and Max of cloud size variation (meters)

property.name: MtnCloudsAspectRange
property.desc: Min and Max of cloud aspect ratio variation (0-1)

property.name: MtnCloudsOpacityRange
property.desc: Min and Max of cloud opacity variation (0-1)

property.name: MtnCloudsIntensityRange
property.desc: Min and Max of cloud intensity variation (0-1)

property.name: MtnCloudsSpeedRange
property.desc: Min and Max of cloud speed variation (meters/msec)

property.name: MtnCloudsShadeOffsetRange
property.desc: Min and Max scale factors for ShadeOffsetDir

property.name: MtnCloudsCursorHideRange
property.desc: Min and Max radii in world units where clouds are hidden by cursor.

property.name: MtnCloudsShadeIntensity
property.desc: brightness of shadow quad as % of highlight (0-1)

property.name: MtnCloudsSimSpeedFactor
property.desc: Multiplier for cloud speed based on sim speed. Slow Med Fast Paused

property.name: MtnCloudsShadeOffsetDir
property.desc: X and Y(Z) offset of shade quad as a ratio of particle size (0-1)

property.name: MtnCloudsMaxParticles
property.desc: Max # of cloud particles that can exist at once

property.name: MtnCloudsMinFadeInTime
property.desc: Min time for particles to fade in when they spawn visible, or to fade out when they die due to age. (Milliseconds)

property.name: MtnCloudsParticleMaxAge
property.desc: Max particle lifetime (Milliseconds)

property.name: MtnCloudsParticleGenRate
property.desc: Particle spawning rate (Particles per second)

property.name: MtnCloudsAllowHiddenParticles
property.desc: if true, particles are still simulated outside of regions where clouds are visible

property.name: MtnCloudsZoomFade
property.desc: Percent of normal opacity by zoom level. Set to 0 to disable a particular zoom. Top is zoom 1 bottom is zoom 5

property.name: NDa_MinTermToSustainSellDealCost (months)
property.desc: Min term required for the neighbor to be able to sustain sell deal cost

property.name: NDb_MinDealAmountPower
property.desc: Min deal amount for power deal

property.name: NDd_MaxDealTerm (years)
property.desc: Max term a deal can be had before renewal.

property.name: NDb_MinDealAmountWater
property.desc: Min deal amount for water deal

property.name: NDc_MinDealProfitFactor
property.desc: Min deal profit factor (1 + NDc_MinDealProfitFactor)

property.name: NDb_MinDealAmountGarbage
property.desc: Min deal amount for garbage deal

property.name: NDc_MaxDealProfitFactor
property.desc: Max deal profit factor (1 + NDc_MinDealProfitFactor)

property.name: NDd_MinDealTerm (years)
property.desc: Min term a deal can be had before renewal.

property.name: NDe_ProfitResponseCurve
property.desc: Maps supply-over-demand to profit factor

property.name: NDa_MaxOverDemandFactorForBuyer
property.desc: buyer_demand * NDa_MaxOverDemandFactorForBuyer is the maximum amount the buyer can buy.

property.name: NDa_MinBudgetForBuyDeals
property.desc: Budget level below which new buy deals become prohibited.

property.name: NDd_SuspensionPeriod
property.desc: Defaulted deals get suspended for this number of days.

property.name: NDd_UnsuspensionPeriod
property.desc: If after suspension period the deal's at default during this number of days it will get killed without being re-suspended.

property.name: NDe_MaxUnitCostForGarbageDealsRCurve
property.desc: Maps true simulation cost to synthetic cost value used by garbage deals.

property.name: MicroSecsPerTimeSlice
property.desc: uSecs of active time for background thread

property.name: SleepMicroSecsAfterTimeSlice
property.desc: uSecs of sleep time for background thread

property.name: ProcessCellsMaxTimeSliceMicroSecs
property.desc: uSec budget for processing cells in main thread

property.name: DisableBackgroundLoader
property.desc: if true, background loader is disabled

property.name: MinLoadRadius
property.desc: Mininum extra radius to load (by zoom level)

property.name: ExtraLoadRadiusPerMeg
property.desc: extra radius to load per free meg (by zoom level)

property.name: LotConfigPropertyRoadRequirement
property.desc: The road corner requirements of the lot. Values: 0C = right corner, 09 = left corner, 08 = normal

property.name: LotConfigPropertyVersion
property.desc: Lot Config Property Version

property.name: LotConfigPropertyMaxSlopeBeforeLotFoundation
property.desc: The slope at which it switches to using a Lot foundation

property.name: LotConfigPropertyMaxSlopeAllowed
property.desc: The Max slope this lot will develop on

property.name: LotConfigPropertyDoConstruction
property.desc: If non-zero, buildings on the lot will construct, otherwise they will be fully constructed when plopped

property.name: LotConfigPropertyMinSlopeAllowed
property.desc: The Min slope this lot will develop on

property.name: Growth Stage
property.desc: Similar to density, but with more granularity. The smallest (1) is the first to appear

property.name: Advice Title Text
property.desc: An advice title text

property.name: Advice Body Text
property.desc: An advice body text

property.name: Advice Ticker Text
property.desc: An advice ticker text

property.name: Is ticker clickable?
property.desc: Is the ticker line a hyper-link

property.name: Flora: Cluster type
property.desc: Flora type that results when combining this type and one of equal or lesser value.

property.name: Flora: Cluster max radius
property.desc: Maximum plane distance for this flora to cluster with others.

property.name: Flora: Cluster max height
property.desc: Maximum altitude differential for this flora to cluster with others.

property.name: kPropertyID_WaterFlora
property.desc: If this property is present, then the given flora is a water flora and its elevation preference table entries are interpreted as depth below sea level instead of altitude above sea level

property.name: Flora: Wild
property.desc: Controls whether the flora appears in landscape mode (wild) or mayor mode (domestic).

property.name: Flora: burnt sweep interval
property.desc: Days between sweeps for burnt stumps (may be fractional)

property.name: Flora: burnt sweep size
property.desc: Maximum number of burnt stumps removed per sweep (may be fractional)

property.name: Flora: elevation scale range
property.desc: Meters from sea level over which to distribute the 16 elevation rows

property.name: PropType
property.desc: If assigned to an occupant, this property denotes it as a prop. Must use a valid prop ID as a property value. See SC4PropOccupant.h

property.name: Requester Satisfaction
property.desc: What prop requester this prop satisfies.

property.name: Prop Wealth
property.desc: What wealth level this prop will appear at

property.name: Nighttime State Change
property.desc: How this prop reacts to night

property.name: Visual effect name
property.desc: If present, indicates an effect by string name. If not present, then 'kExemplarPropertyID_ExemplarName' is used.

property.name: Prop occupant class ID
property.desc: Uint32: The class ID of the prop occupant to create. If not present, then 'kGZCLSID_cSC4PropOccupant' is used.

property.name: Ignore lot state effects
property.desc: If set to true, specifies that the prop should ignore lot state effects (distressed, abandoned, etc.).

property.name: Self-illuminated
property.desc: If set to true, specifies that the prop should be treated as self-lit

property.name: Prop Time of Day
property.desc: Range of hours on 24-hour clock (0-23) when prop will be at state 0 (visible). If start and end times are both 0, always visible.

property.name: Global Effect Trigger
property.desc: Trigger ID for script-defined global effect that turns this prop on (state 0) and off (state 1).

property.name: Active Lot State
property.desc: What lot state this prop is active in. Don't add the property if the prop is active in all lot states.

property.name: Is Ground Model
property.desc: Present if this prop is a ground-based model suitable for demolish fx, shadows, and collision avoidance

property.name: States as Frames
property.desc: Add this property only if prop states are visually depicted by different frames in an animated model instance

property.name: Simulator Date Start
property.desc: Simulator MONTH (1-12) and DAY (1-31) to start this prop's date interval

property.name: Simulator Date Interval
property.desc: How often this prop becomes active, in days.

property.name: Prop Random Chance
property.desc: Random chance (0-100) of this prop appearing according to time-of-day and simulator date

property.name: Simulator Date Duration
property.desc: How long in simulator days the prop will stay active once triggered

property.name: Prop Destroys Lot
property.desc: Whether or not prop destroys entire lot when it burns down. Default is true for flammable props.

property.name: Previewable
property.desc: If set to true, the prop will appear in the building plop preview

property.name: Query as main building
property.desc: If set to true, when the prop is hover queried it will highlight both itself and the main building (and give the same hover data)

property.name: Requires Power to Appear
property.desc: Prop only appears if lot is powered

property.name: Orient To Slope
property.desc: Prop rotates x/z to match slope

property.name: Light
property.desc: Set if prop has a light mask and should light up at night with the lot building.

property.name: Animated Prop Play Mode
property.desc: Whether animated props should be looped, ping-pong, or one-shot. If not present, the default is Loop.

property.name: Crime Incident ID
property.desc: Which crime simulator incident this prop represents, or 0 if it's a generic crime prop.

property.name: Helipad Type
property.desc: Indicate what kind of helicopter should appear on this helipad

property.name: Airplane Hanger Type
property.desc: Indicate what kind of airplane should appear at this point

property.name: Runway End Number
property.desc: Indicate the location of the end of a runway. Must come in pairs.

property.name: GarbageFilterResponse
property.desc: (Deprecated) Response for GarbageFilter

property.name: WealthFilterResponse
property.desc: (Deprecated) Response for WealthFilter

property.name: CrimeFilterResponse
property.desc: (Deprecated) Response for CrimeFilter

property.name: PropPlacement
property.desc: Intended to control Z/R-dependent prop placement. Not implemented yet.

property.name: Removable Stoplight Prop
property.desc: This is an intersection stoplight prop that can be removed by the engine if necessary.

property.name: Flammability
property.desc: Flammability rating of this occupant

property.name: MaxFireStage
property.desc: (0-5) highest fire stage this occupant can reach

property.name: Special case only
property.desc: If set, occupant is never chosen based on user action or normal simulation.

property.name: Worth
property.desc: If e.g., the occupant gets destroyed by a disaster, this is the reported damage amount

property.name: Requires power to animate
property.desc: Set this to true if the occupant requires power to animate

property.name: MinForPurposeFundingPercentageToAnimate
property.desc: (PurposeId, funding)The occupant needs to be funded by at least this much for the specified purpose, for it to animate

property.name: Item Name
property.desc: The item name that will be visible to the player

property.name: Item Description
property.desc: Human-readable description of this item

property.name: Item Icon
property.desc: Resource instance ID of Menu Icon for this item

property.name: Item Order
property.desc: Controls position in menu

property.name: Item Submenu
property.desc: If needed: which sub menu this item belongs to

property.name: Item Button ID
property.desc: If needed: the button id this item corresponds to

property.name: Catalog Monthly Cost
property.desc: Value for displaying monthly cost in the catalog - not simulated

property.name: Catalog Monthly Cost (float)
property.desc: Float value for displaying monthly cost in the catalog - not simulated

property.name: Catalog Capacity
property.desc: Value for displaying capacity in the catalog - not simulated

property.name: Item Description Key
property.desc: Resource key of the string resource of the description

property.name: Industrial Building Type
property.desc: Which type of Industrial (Anchor/Out/Mech)

property.name: Construction Time
property.desc: Construction time in Sim-days

property.name: Bulldoze Cost
property.desc: Bulldoze cost to delete the building, in Simoleans(tm)

property.name: Plop Cost
property.desc: Cost to plop this building, in Simoleans(tm)

property.name: Occupant Size
property.desc: In meters: Width Height Depth

property.name: Wealth
property.desc: Wealth represented by the building

property.name: Purpose
property.desc: Function of building

property.name: Capacity Satisfied
property.desc: paired values-developer ID, and how much capacity this building offers to that developer

property.name: Allow Joint Occupancy
property.desc: if true, different types can occupy the building simultaneously

property.name: Monopoly Piece
property.desc: If true, this building is for debug and tuning use only

property.name: Demand Satisfied
property.desc: paired values-demand ID, and how much plopping this building supplies the resource

property.name: Demand Created
property.desc: paired values-demand ID, and how much plopping this building increases the demand for the resource

property.name: Demand Satisfied (float)
property.desc: IDs from Demand Satisfied are associated to these values instead of the Uint32 values

property.name: Demand Created (float)
property.desc: IDs from Demand Created are associated to these values instead of the Uint32 values

property.name: Demand Is Variable
property.desc: if true, the demand simulator ignores demand created and demand satisfied until instructed

property.name: Landmark Effect
property.desc: magnitude, radius

property.name: Park Effect
property.desc: magnitude, radius

property.name: Pollution at center
property.desc: Pollution generated: air, water, garbage, radiation (at center of the area of effect)

property.name: AppearanceZoomsFlag
property.desc: Flag specifying the zooms in which the model should appear

property.name: Mayor Rating Effect
property.desc: Mayor rating effect: magnitude, radius

property.name: Crime Effect
property.desc: Crime effect: magnitude, radius. Doesn't increase overall crime, but can negate effects of police stations

property.name: Pollution at outer edge of circle
property.desc: Pollution generated: air, water, garbage, radiation (at outer radius of area of effect)

property.name: Pollution radii
property.desc: Radii for pollution generated: air, water, garbage, radiation

property.name: Power Generated
property.desc: Amount of power generated

property.name: Power Plant Type
property.desc: Type of power plant

property.name: Power Consumed
property.desc: Amount of power consumed

property.name: Hard Failure Type
property.desc: Explosion type at end of life

property.name: Power pole monthly upkeep
property.desc: Cost of maintaining this power pole

property.name: Power line monthly upkeep
property.desc: Cost of maintaining each cell of wire connected to this power pole

property.name: Water Treatment monthly capacity
property.desc: Amount of water treated per month

property.name: Incinerator monthly capacity
property.desc: Amount of trash burned per month

property.name: Waste to energy monthly Capacity
property.desc: Amount of trash converted to energy per month

property.name: Recycling center percent reduction
property.desc: Percentage by which recycling center reduces trash

property.name: Recycling center population served
property.desc: Number of people that can be served by this recycling center

property.name: Water Consumed
property.desc: Amount of water consumed

property.name: Water Produced
property.desc: Amount of water produced

property.name: Garbage Capacity
property.desc: Amount of garbage the building can store in a month

property.name: Water Source
property.desc: Where this water producer gets its water

property.name: Building/prop Family
property.desc: The family that this building or prop is a member of

property.name: Transit Switch Point
property.desc: Paired entries indicating this building allows a travelling Sim to switch between transit types

property.name: Transit Switch Entry Cost
property.desc: Step cost to enter this transit switch

property.name: Transit Switch Traffic Capacity
property.desc: Amount of traffic the switch can handle without increasing travel time

property.name: Transit Switch Fare
property.desc: Simoleon charge per traveller to enter the switch

property.name: Transit Switch Capacity Effect
property.desc: If true, this building radiates capacity reduction like intersections

property.name: Building value
property.desc: Base value in simoleons of this building

property.name: Power plant energy conversion cost
property.desc: Cost to produce one unit of electricity, not including infrastructure maintenance

property.name: Age degradation rate
property.desc: How fast this plant degrades over time

property.name: Soft failure threshold
property.desc: Threshold at which soft failure occurs

property.name: Hard failure threshold
property.desc: Threshold at which hard failure occurs

property.name: Age to maintenance cost multiplier response curve
property.desc: Converts the current age degradation of the plant to a multiplier for maintenance cost

property.name: Age to output level response curve
property.desc: Converts the current age degradation of the plant to a multiplier for production level

property.name: Water building pumping cost
property.desc: Cost to produce one unit of water, not including infrastructure maintenance

property.name: Lot Resource Key
property.desc: For ploppable buildings: Resource instance ID of lot exemplar for this building

property.name: Health effect radius
property.desc: Radius of generic health effect of this building

property.name: Health effect strength
property.desc: Strength of generic health effect of this building (positive or negative)

property.name: City Exclusion Group
property.desc: For ploppable buildings: No more than one building within the specified group can be built in a single city.

property.name: Regional Exclusion Group
property.desc: For ploppable buildings: No more than one building within the specified group can be built in a single region.

property.name: Conditional Building
property.desc: If true, building will appear ghosted in the menu until triggered by a script condition

property.name: Radiation Spew Intensity
property.desc: Intensity of radiation spew when power plant blows up

property.name: Radiation Spew Radius
property.desc: Radius of radiation spew when power plant blows up

property.name: Hospital Coverage Radius
property.desc: Radius of this hospital's coverage, in meters

property.name: Hospital Patient Capacity
property.desc: Maximum number of patients served by this hospital

property.name: Hospital Population vs. Distance
property.desc: Maps distance from hospital to a % of population covered

property.name: Hospital HQ boost
property.desc: Inherent HQ boost of this hospital

property.name: Hospital Effectiveness vs. Average Age
property.desc: Maps Average age of a tract to the % HQ boost the hospital gives the tract

property.name: Hosptial Effectiveness vs. Wealth
property.desc: Maps wealth level to HQ boost %

property.name: Hospital Type ID List
property.desc: Variable length list of type IDs for this hospital

property.name: School Coverage Radius
property.desc: Radius of a school's coverage, in meters

property.name: School Student Capacity
property.desc: Maximum number of students served by this school

property.name: School Population vs. Distance
property.desc: Maps distance from school to a % of population covered

property.name: School EQ boost
property.desc: The EQ boost the school gives at it's origin

property.name: School Effectiveness vs. Average Age
property.desc: Maps Average age of a tract to the % EQ boost the school gives the tract

property.name: School Effectiveness vs. Wealth
property.desc: Maps wealth level to EQ boost %

property.name: School Type ID List
property.desc: Variable length list of type IDs for this school

property.name: Ferry Terminal Type
property.desc: Type of ferry terminal

property.name: Building foundation
property.desc: Foundation type ID for this building or lot. Absent for none.

property.name: kSC4BuildingModelRotationProperty
property.desc: If property is present (regardless of value), then the model can be rotated and contains 'full geometry'.

property.name: kSC4BuildingNoModelProperty
property.desc: If present, then there are no building-style models for this building and if there are any, they should be ignored.

property.name: kSC4BuildingModelClassProperty
property.desc: If present, specifies a GZCLSID (class id) for the model class to use. Otherwise, just use the default kGZCLSID_cS3DModelInstance.

property.name: No Shadows
property.desc: If true, building will not draw shadows

property.name: Response vehicle type
property.desc: Group(s) of vehicle automata that will be created when this building is constructed or plopped.

property.name: Response vehicle count
property.desc: How many of each type (in Response Vehicle Type property) will be created when building is constructed or plopped.

property.name: Response pedestrian type
property.desc: Group(s) of pedestrian automata that will be created when this building is constructed or plopped.

property.name: Response pedestrian count
property.desc: How many of each type (in Response Pedestrian Type property) will be created when building is constructed or plopped.

property.name: Field Lots
property.desc: A list of IDs of 1x1 lots that describe a field tile associated with this building (will choose 1 randomly)

property.name: Freight Receiving Capacity
property.desc: Freight traffic that can arrive at this building

property.name: SFX:Default Plop Sound
property.desc: GUID of sound played when building is plopped

property.name: SFX:Ambience Good Sound
property.desc: GUID of sound played when building is around and in good working order

property.name: SFX:Ambience Decayed Sound
property.desc: GUID of sound played when building is around and damaged or decayed

property.name: SFX:Activate Sound
property.desc: GUID of sound played when building goes online

property.name: SFX:AlarmSoundId
property.desc: GUID of sound played when alarm goes off

property.name: SFX:AlarmTime
property.desc: 24hour times i.e. 15.5

property.name: SFX:Occupant Instance Sound
property.desc: GUID of sound played for the occupant. There will be one instance per occupant.

property.name: SFX:Alarm Ambience Sound
property.desc: GUID of sound. Plays between alarm times.

property.name: SFX:Query Sound
property.desc: GUID of the sound to play when the occupant is clicked on with query tool

property.name: SFX:Query Sound Abandoned
property.desc: GUID of the sound to play when the occupant is clicked on with query tool and is abandoned.

property.name: SFX:Query Sound decayed
property.desc: GUID of the sound to play when the occupant is clicked on with query tool and is decayed.

property.name: SFX:Intersection Sound
property.desc: GUID of the sound to play when the occupant approaches an intersection

property.name: SFX:Demolition Sound
property.desc: GUID of the sound to play when an occupant is demolished

property.name: SFX:ActiveSound
property.desc: GUID array of sounds to play (per zoom) when occupant is 'active'

property.name: Budget Item: Department
property.desc: GUID(s) of department ID for this budget item

property.name: Budget Item: Line
property.desc: GUID(s) of line item ID for this budget item

property.name: Budget Item: Purpose
property.desc: GUID(s) of purpose ID for this budget item

property.name: Budget Item: Cost
property.desc: Cost(s) in Simoleans for this budget item

property.name: Query exemplar GUID
property.desc: GUID for this building's Query exemplar

property.name: Landmark Homage Key
property.desc: Resource key of string to be displayed in the landmark's query dialog

property.name: Desirability Effect IDs
property.desc: Growth Developer IDs to go with next property

property.name: Desirability Effect Values
property.desc: Radius in cells, Max effect, and min effect for each developer

property.name: Goofy Stat Response Curve
property.desc: Response curve for the Goofy Stat field in query dialogs

property.name: Crane Hints
property.desc: What kind of crane to use

property.name: (Obs) kSC4BuildingPropertyCrimeEffectCenterStrength
property.desc: Strength of the crime in the area near the building. This number is in some imaginary units.

property.name: (Obs) kSC4BuildingPropertyCrimeEffectExteriorStrength
property.desc: Strength of the police in the area at the radius of effect. This number is in some imaginary units.

property.name: (Obs) kSC4BuildingPropertyCrimeEffectRadius
property.desc: A measurement of the radius, in meters, of the effect of this building.

property.name: (Obs) kSC4BuildingPropertyCrimeEffectFactor
property.desc: A dynamic property which is normally 1.0, but can be roughly -2.0 to +2.0.

property.name: (Obs)Mass Transit monthly upkeep
property.desc: Cost of maintaining this building to mass transit budget

property.name: Obsolete! (Supported Zones)
property.desc: Specifies zones compatible with building

property.name: Obsolete! (Density)
property.desc: Density of population represented by the building

property.name: Capacity (secondary)
property.desc: paired values-developer ID, and how much capacity this building offers to that developer

property.name: (Obs)Utility building monthly upkeep
property.desc: Cost of maintaining this utility building

property.name: (Obs)Landmark Monthly Maintenance
property.desc: Cost of maintaining this to the landmark budget

property.name: Style
property.desc: Building Art Style (Chi,Dal,NYC,etc...)

property.name: (Obs)Hospital Staff Budget
property.desc: Cost of paying the staff for this hospital

property.name: (Obs)Hospital Ambulance Budget
property.desc: Cost of operating ambulances for this hospital
